description: Inconsistent state naming (e.g., "Andaman & Nicobar" vs "Andaman and Nicobar Islands")
resolution: PIN-based canonicalization using official postal directory
impact: Reduced state count from 55-71 to standardized 36 states

resolution: PIN-based canonicalization using official postal directory
impact: Standardized district names across all datasets

description: Some records had PIN codes not in reference directory
resolution: Retained original Aadhaar state/district for missing PINs
impact: Preserved data completeness while maintaining accuracy

description: Improved map rendering and spatial analysis reliability
resolution: Single source of truth for state/district reduces join failures
impact: Enabled accurate choropleth maps and spatial queries
